content.detailedDescription: Watering garden and taking pics of it looked up at sound of bird and sighted object. stopped and turned camera to video mode auto focus was still on and made it look further away than it was. it was traveling north.No contrails. no sound. solid mass. second sighting in 2 consecutive days. first sighting was while i was driving it was only visible for 5 seconds and it was headed northwest 7-01-08 kinda scary.
content.summary: White oblong like a hard eyeglass case

content.detailedDescription: Friday night at around 10:00pm we saw an orange ball that looked like a flare but of course couldn't be since it was travelling in the sky at a very high altitude and then vanished. the light came from the north and travelled to the south. this happened 4 other times until about 12:30am. we thought it was strange but what are the odds of actually seeing a ufo. but later at around 2:00am i was outside on the side of the house smoking a cigarette when i saw it...It was up in the sky a very bright light was surrounding the round "ship" i noticed that one of the street light was off. i had my cell phone and when i went to take a picture it bolted out of here in a matter of seconds. i also noticed that when it left the street light turned back on. few seconds later it came back and again the street light turned off again. i finally got a chance to take the picture with my camera phone. during those three hours the light would often move around very very quickly. at one point, we saw an airplane coming closer and closer and it looked like the "ship" did a 360 turn very fast to be face to face to the airplane and then left again. at around5:00am it just went higher and higher until we couldn't see it anymore. sunday 2008-06-29 we saw it again at around the same time until about 5:30am...This time i was armed with a digital camera and actually filmed it but the pictures and film aren't the best...It's very strange because when i clicked i could clearly see what i was photographing but once i was ready to view it it wasn't very clear.On the 27th i was with my daughter and two nephews and on the 29th i was alone. i couldn't believe it!!! we couldn't believe it!!! i have many pictures and film.
content.summary: It kept moving around very quickly went far away and came back very quick...

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at a bus stop after work one evening at 7:12pm. i was taking digital photos with my new camera, an olympus fe-310. the sky was overcast with thick grey clouds. the first photo i took was of the clouds, which shows nothing unusual. for the second photo, taken mere seconds after the first, i zoomed in a little and i noticed something was now in the sky. i thought maybe it could be either a blimp, though they do not move fast enough to just appear in the second photo; or an insect flew into frame and the black speck is just that, although in the photo, the speck feels very far away in the distant sky. i wish my camera imprinted the time and date down to the second, rather than just minute, to truly show how little time lapsed between both photos. i can, and would like to, submit both high-resolution untampered photos (3264x2448) for your review. maybe its just a blimp, maybe its more. didn't think much at the time, except how strange it was that a 'blimp' could move so fast. within less than a minute this shape appeared and disappeared. if i knew how to check for possibly aircraft over that location at the specific time on my own, i would look into it being a blimp. i photograph the sky all the time, and have gotten birds, planes, and blimps that i could identify easily with zoom functions. this i cannot.

i have attached said photos, note that the timestamp on them (in the file properties) states it as 7:12 am, though it is actually pm, my camera was new and set 12 hours behind accidentally. hope it may be of interest.
content.summary: Blimp-like object apears and disappears within less than 1 minute

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through the woods on a trail on my way to make a fire when i looked up and toward my right and a little bit above the tree line i saw a slow moving flying object in the shape of a boomerange with a red light in the front and appoximatly six white lights 3 on either side.  the last light that was on the side the ufo was facing me was pretty bright.  then my friend and i kept walking thinking that it was a plane or something when the object made a really weird suction like noise with a few sudden beeps, the sound was like nothing that i ever heard before and stopped us in our tracks and it also produced a slight wind and when i looked up at the object again it just vanished and was no where to be seen.  the sound was the strangest and out of this world sound that i ever heard and after hearing there was no doubt that what i saw wasn't from this planet
content.summary: Boomerang shape with approximatly six white lights with one red light.

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor (girlfriend) and i were sitting in indian boundary park in chicago (around lunt and western) on city's north side. i've lived here 30 years, seen countless planes pass overhead going toward or coming from o'hare airport perhaps 10 miles to the west. ive seen birds, ballons, kites, etc. anyway, we were facing north, sitting on a bench, sun sort of behind us about 10 or 10:30 in the morning. had a clear view of the sky as the park is open all around. planes went by under a very bright, glaring cloud cover, appeared small so clouds were pretty high up. it was so bright and hazy i put my sunglasses on over my distance glasses as i often do. suddenly a white disc , brighter than the clouds and bright enough to be seen clearly came as it were from off to our 'left' (west) moving steadily east with a slight wavy motion but on a constant course. moved faster than planes at that altitude had earlier. it seemed to be immersed inside the haze not on the cloud surface, like an object just inside the lower, hazy part of the clopud cover. about fifteen seconds in our view it came overhead, slowed, then all at once went vertically straight up inside the cloud cover, calculating the size of clouds by comparison to your average airliner i'd say it shot up hundreds of feet in a second or two, made a loop and came back down to about the same level, then moved steadily off toward the east. whole thing took about 30- 40 seconds. it began to move behind tree branches blocking our view so i jumped up and stood to watch it. as it moved east inside the cloud cover it kept its shape and did not seem to grow smaller as it hadnt traveled that far, and eventually vanished in the haze. no way is was an aircraft headlight. weird thing was that as it was moving away still bright enough to be seen even inside the brilliant cloudy haze i could make out what must have been huge v-shaped 'wings" inside the circle of light. it reminded me of one of those v-shaped electric guitars you see. just two wings, though i couldnt make out the point at which they jopined. they were clearly solid objects imbeded inside the circle of light, almost well concealed, but i could make it cout for about 8-10 seconds. i had on good quality sunglasses. my friend (age 55) was quite stunned, looking at me and asking what was that? over and over, though she had no sunglasses on and didnt see the wings. i was rather stunned too. i ran a number of ideas through my mind but was and still am certain the object being brighter than the sunny clouds had to be really powerfully illuminated ( more of a matte finish glow, not like a street lamp) and was self guided. i've waited until now to think about reporting it. i searched for similar sightings on the web. found only a few regarding circles of light in mexico. but this was during the day. an airline at that distance would have been smaller than the circle of light and wouldnt have done a huge loop. all i can say is that those wings were cloaked as it were inside the light as if it were a camoflage or something, they remained positioned inside the circle as it moved off and vanished in the haze more or less off to our 'right' i.E.It did not travel as far as the horizon.
content.summary: Bright circle-shaped light imbedded in bright, sunny cloud cover but brighter than clouds; giant v-shaped wings hidden inside

content.detailedDescription: On june 25th between 1-130am i was on my front porch when i noticed a strange sound. sounded very similier to a passenger jet but not as low in tone and at a higher pitch. as i heard the sound i took a peak up in the sky and saw a boomerang shaped object fairly low to the ground roughly 1000ft off ground. it had white lights from the points of the boomerang spaced evenly to the middle of the boomerang and had a football shaped body with mirrored lights on both sides of the body with the back light being red the middle white and the last being green. it moved at a fairly slow pace. if you put your arm up at a 45 degree angle and move your arm right to left slowly for 1 second then from fingertip to fingertip it would have been 6 inches the boomerang shaped object moved. thats just a rough idea of how fast it was going. i watched it for a good 5 minutes and went inside just blowing it off as a airforce jet or some kind of jet till i saw the news paper article in the bucks county courier times and saw others had the same sighting. i just wanted to report it just to maybe help in identifying the object in your future investigation. feel free to contact me with any further questions mufon may have in this matter
content.summary: Witnessed boomerang shape object

content.detailedDescription: Was out in back yard at 1:30 a.M. letting puppy out.  very, very dark out back, but noted flashes of bright white lights (thought they were shooting stars) that kept appearing high up behind the trees.  as i was out back for a few minutes, it was not easy to miss these lights, as they were very bright, and it is very, very dark here at night.  could only see the lights but nothing else as there are very large trees scattered throughtout the neighbors yards.  i wasn't scared, but rather curious; and i thought it was very odd at that hour of the morning to see these bright lights behind the trees.  i was a bit freaked out, and went back in and went to bed.  did tell my 13-year old son, and husband, and mentioned it to my neighbor the other day because i have not been out in the middle of the night since, as i was completely spooked.  did not even give it a second thought again until today, when it was broadcast on the 5:30 p.M. news.  again, don't know what the lights were from, did not note any object and for sure will not be letting the dog out during those early am hours again.
content.summary: Bright lights appeared in early am hours above trees; thought they were shooting stars

content.detailedDescription:
It was april 20,2008 i was a sleep in my falls township apartment and i was woken by noice. sounds like screen ripping,i thought someone was ripping someones screen.It woke my yorkie also he was growling, so we got up, open sliding doors out back.My eyes were drown to look at the sky, while the dog went to the bathroom.I saw this object huffering around the sky. it frigheen me i shut the door left the dog out side i thought i would be sucked up thats how beliveable this thing was. i wasnt really a believer, i woke my husband after standing watching this thing over the yard , for over  a half and hour .Doing a dance in the sky. the way it shuffeled  around no straight line going or comning. it was like someone had a dust cloth wiping a table top thats the best way to discribe how it moved around the sky,there where lights coming down, like a cone shape
and i also saw very large disc shape lights on the bottom of this object
and it was a very clear night i looked at the stars and know no way no how was it a star. and it made no noise, no motor sounds  no ,helicopter, 
no it wasnt a plane, my father and mother both worked in aviation, mother boeing. v-22, my father chief superviosr of twa airlines for 40 years i grow up in the airline business,i woke my  husband which i never do. i said you know i dont believe in ufo,but hon, i think there is one out back.
he got up and watched a little bit and he said its nothing he ever saw before, i asked my neigbhor who is in the willow grove air base the next day, ask him if they are doing any testing .He said 'no way'' and i promised my neigbhor and daughter if it happens again i would call them and it did twice since then  may,and that happen at 3.00am and on june  12 at 1.30 am my daughter saved my call on her cell phone message.She and her husband also saw it that last time and also took a photo. i just read a story today in the paper and called james mc ginnis.And forward the picture i have ,its wired, it turn out so differnt on the film then what i was seeing. i will send it to you. my neighor came out the secong time it happen i woke her up i promised her i would, it wasnt moving for her,but she saw it. its usally in one or two places,in  the yard.When it leaves, it kind of shuffles right side ways into a cloud.
content.summary: Was awaken by my dog heard noice,went  out side with him saw this object in the skyhuvering

content.detailedDescription: The clouds, the clouds, they hide behind *within* the clouds. does anyone remember what the sky used to look like? lying on the roof at 5am on saturday morning, sober, sound of mind and gazing peacefully at stars splayed accross unusually clear skies. the city is sleeping as soundly as it ever does, everyone passed out after celebrating the end of another busy week. venus (pretty sure) in the south, a little west. in come the whispy weirdo clouds, you may know the ones i refer to. suddenly i feel a little strange. i havent used psychedelics in years, but the tears of joy reminded me of the deepest shades of mushroom blue. between the clouds moving in from the southwest, i see the stars are moving toward the clouds. as they should be. an optical illusion of course, the stars arent really moving. but they are. slowly. not all of them. dozens and dozens of them. am i hallucinating? trying to figure it out. they look and move like sattelites... here comes the sun, obscures the stars and leaves me wondering if i dreamed the whole thing. to the south, venus, still blazing in the pinkish pre dawn glow. a single light, the intensity of venus, just west of venus herself. coming toward me, an airplane no doubt. by now the clouds have taken on more substance, cumulus like and fluffy. light moves slowly to the west, behind the biggest of the clouds. emerges 15 seconds later, almost above my head. twice the intensity of venus now, and obviously not a jet. just a very blight light. floating between the clouds, same speed, same direction. the following days... strange geometric shapes just barely disguised starngeness in the clouds. triangles, cubes, and the like. what the hell is going on?
content.summary: The clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly,me and my child were stargazing and we saw a bright round object
as bright as the moon.(we were out in the patio).As soon as we saw it,it got dimmer and moved northeast.Then we lost sight of it. i couldn't sleep
that night.
content.summary: Round,dimming from south to northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a swim meet near the oxford valley mall on july 1 at about 9 pm. my one friend pointed to the sky and said "what is that thing in the sky." it looked like a boomerang and had red and white flashing lights. it was hovering in place. i thought it was just an odd shaped plane. we all agreed and just continued on with our swimming.

i read an article about it in the bucks county courier times. i remembered my encounter last night and realized that it was important that i e-mail mufon.
content.summary: I saw a boomerang shaped object hovering over an area near the oxford valley mall.

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of 6/02/08 at 6:30 am at the window of my hotel room on the 16 fl,of the fallsview casino,i decided the take a few pictures of the falls and surrounding area because of the nice sunny early morning sunrise.My first shot a object can be seen below the crest and to the right of the mist.By my second and third shot the object was gone that fast.I turned to my right a few minutes later to shoot a pic of this tower in the distance and caught this object to the right of the tower.Canadian athourities have told me theres a 3,500 foot restricted airspace around the falls and heicopters are also not allowed to fly below the crest or in the mist of the falls.It also appears theres this extended probe pointing at a right angle from the top of this thing-- from one of my zoomed in enhancements.I dont think this is a seagull by no means.
content.summary: Object below  the crest and in the mist of the falls

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of 6/02/08 at 6:30 am at the window of my hotel room on the 16 fl,of the fallsview casino,i decided the take a few pictures of the falls and surrounding area because of the nice sunny early morning sunrise.My first shot a object can be seen below the crest and to the right of the mist.By my second and third shot the object was gone that fast.I turned to my right a few minutes later to shoot a pic of this tower in the distance and caught this object to the right of the tower.Canadian athourities have told me theres a 3,500 foot restricted airspace around the falls and heicopters are also not allowed to fly below the crest or in the mist of the falls.It also appears theres this extended probe pointing at a right angle from the top of this thing-- from one of my zoomed in enhancements.I dont think this is a seagull by no means.
content.summary: Object below  the crest and in the mist of the falls

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amature storm chaser (tornado's) when i took these pics. i captured the object on the very first photo and without realizing that there was something in the air. i sent the pic to a friend to analyze and he says he cannot tell what it is. he says it's not a fly, bee, bird, or any other man made object but did note that whatever it is, it is definately taking on the sun's rays on the correct side of the sun, (whatever that means).

i believe i was at route 83 moving west on route 173. but i am not exactly clear on that.

like i said before, i did not know what i had until i downloaded these pic's to my computer and the first initial thought from my lovely wife was "omg! that looks like a disc or flying saucer".

as you can see, i took 2 more pictures after the first one without realizing i had captured "something" at the first shot. also, i did not want to report it but at the urging of my wife and friends i'm doing it now. please let me know what you think this is.

thank you,

ralph nickel
content.summary: I did not know i captured an image until i downloaded those pic's.

content.detailedDescription: I live in wisterwood which is about a mile from the oxford valley mall. i walked outside my house at about 9 30 with my gf and i happened to look up into the sky and saw this egg shaped aircraft. it looked a little strange so it caught my attention. it was hovering in the sky above the oxford valley mall direction. as i looked at it, it started out slow then took off. ive never seen anything so fast in my life. it disappeared like something from a movie. i know this was a ufo because there was a plane traveling at the same time and it was no where near as fast or looked like this did. it looked like something from a movie. i was shocked because i knew what i had saw.
content.summary: Egg shaped aircraft blinking

content.detailedDescription: I'm sitting out in the backyard in the desert. very clear nighttime sky. an object that was reddish white moved into my view in a north north east direction and kept a straight line into the distance. it did not meet with the horizon, and the vanishing point was higher up in the sky. the strange thing about it was it didn't have any flashing lights on it like a plane or helicopter would. it made no sound. the light seemed very high up, and larger than an aircraft, and the vanishing point was also higher than any normal aircraft. i watched it vanish into the distance but much higher up from the horizon. weird. only other thing i can compare it with would be the coloration of a blood red moon.. bright, and the color was dullish red. i wanted to report it simply for the fact that the vanishing point makes no sense to me. it faded much higher up in the sky than normal aircraft would. and if anyone else saw anything tonight too. no trail like a shooting star would make and about one quarter the speed of a shooting star. it slowed progressively, and got smaller and smaller until it disappeared, and faded very high above the horizon compared with normal aircraft when they would pass over this area. i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Bright reddish white light

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my deck on my third floor apartment at 11:35 p.M..  i lit a cig and laid down on our bench oriented almost east to west, looking to my left(southerly). i was there almost 2-3 min looking at the stars.  i had the feeling to look to the northern. when i did, i focused upon a star sized light moving to the ssw from the nne about, from my perspective, two inches below the last star in the "handle" of the big dipper.  the light traveled         about two & one half inches. it was constant in its white color and had no blinking pattern. we have all heard that these high altitude lights, in a straight flight path, are satellites orbiting the earth reflecting the suns light like the moon.  as i thought this, the object took a sharp turn to the south, traveled at an accelerated pace for about a half an inch and disappeared.  there were clouds to the west, but not near this area of the sky and none of the other stars in the area became obscured during this part of the event.  i shouted for my girl to come out to the deck and as 4 or 5 seconds past the light returned.  this time it was traveling to the ne.  it traveled about 3/4 of an inch and disappeared 1/2 inch to the west and 1 inch below the last star in the handle of the big dipper.  as my girl came out on the deck the light was not visible .  we waited about 1 to 2 minutes, scanning the sky around the big dipper when i noticed the light in almost the same location from which it disappeared, traveling in about the same direction.  i was able to point out the light to my lady and we watched the object traverse the handle of the big dipper.  once again, the light disappeared almost 1 inch past the handle of the big dipper.  we waited & watched for maybe 5-8 more minutes, talking about what we had seen.  i decided to fill out this report immediately.  after getting online and starting this report, my lady saw the light return in the same area from which it had disappeared.  she watched the object for about 10 seconds before it again disappeared.  i feel extra good and lucky to have seen something like this light, though the mystery of its actions and identity are probably going to keep me up all night.
content.summary: Satellite like ,high altiude light, multiple travel directions, multiple sightings

content.detailedDescription:
On june 28, 2008, i was leaving for work at approximately 10:30am central time from my house in the heights near downtown houston, tx, when i leaned back to use my contact solution and noticed a particularly strange formation in a cloud overhead.  the cloud was approximately 300-350ft. wide and elongated in shape.  nothing strange there except what caught my eye.  

i noticed a perfect dome of air being pressed up under the cloud.  i've heard of this perfectly normal weather phenomenon before, but never had seen it so i inspected it more closely and noticed a perfectly round whole in the top of it which exposed something black.  this still wasn't to out of place, but it was unusual to me, so i continued to stare.  

then what caught me eye next is something even more remarkable.  in the top upper left hand side of the cloud was a perfectly shaped cube.  i say cube because it looked as if a cube had punched through it leaving a square on the bottom and a square on the top.  i could see two sides of the cube in the middle and another parcial side. the square in the top exposed blue sky. it was about 40' from top to bottom.

it looked as if something had gone from the ground up because there where tiny wisps of the cloud coming from the sides of the flat surfaces of the cube and they where caught in an upward draft.  this is when i began to inspect it more closely and entirely.  

inside the cloud was a dark mass, but the mass was a perfect triangle!  i began to become excited.  i knocked on the door to show my mother whom i had just woken but she didn't answer, so i knocked on her bedroom window.  later we realized that she was passing through the door to use the restroom and i had just missed her at both places.

the cloud was drifting, so i had to crane my neck to see it and when i did, the tip exposed itself.  it was black in color, perfectly shaped and awe inspiring.  i tried to follow it but it passed over my neighbor's house and into the trees.  i did get to see it for about 10 seconds and since the cloud had a silver lining from the sun and it was a good distance ( approx. 30 -35 feet from the silver lining.  i definitely could tell it wasn't part of the cloud and was solid.

since i no longer could see that, i turned my attention back to the cube, but it was beginning to break up.  so i focused on the dark shape inside the cloud.  that's when part of the cloud opened up and i saw the back of what was in the cloud!

what i saw was the tail end of a craft of some sort.  it was enormous!  i couldn't see the entire tail end of what was in the craft, but i did see multiple rows of rectangles not all the same in size and length, but perfect in shape and they were laying horizontally.  they weren't all the same in color either, but where all perfectly shaped.  they were earthy tones like copper, khaki, beige and light browns. they shined like metal, but not overly so. 

after watching this for a moment as the cloud began to envelope the back end, a pod of 8 or 9 purple martins floated into the scene.  i've grown up with these birds and they weren't acting normal in nature.  they almost looked metallic in color.  i instantly felt the feeling as if something was trying to sway my attention.  the birds where riding a thermal, but none of them flapped their wings, which is unusual for all 8 or 9 martins to not be doing.  my mother later pointed out that maybe they where riding the thermal of this craft and/or what punched through the cloud.  but i begged to differ, but do consider.

i could no longer see the darkness in the cloud when returning my attention back to it.  "they succeeded," i told myself.  i finally returned my attention to the door and wanted to tell my mother of this experience.  she was very upset that see didn't get to see it, but if i turned my head away then it would have darted off.

i got on the road and went to work.  on my way, i was looking at other clouds trying to find it or find something else.  there where other dark masses in the clouds, but none like what i had just witnessed and what a perfect way to cloak itself.

now this is what's important to what i was saying about my mother and i disagreeing that i mentioned in the beginning.  i went to work twice yesterday.  once in the morning and again at 10:30pm central time.  because i was looking for it in the day while driving, i was on my way to work and not coming home.  she tells it as if i where on my way home and not on the way to work.

she and my grandmother both complained to me of having a terrible headache when i returned home from work around 4:30 pm.  but i can't get her to understand that how could i be looking for a cloud with sun on it and dark shapes in them if i'm at home and not driving?  she remembers me telling her that i would tell grandmother about it over coffee on sunday morning (june, 29, 2008) because i wanted to take a nap before returning to work that evening. 

i thought i had it explained to her, but she refuses to believe me.  as i type this, she's telling me that i'm still wrong.  

interesting footnote, last night i dreamed of fibers being pulled from my head.  but i know i was looking for it in the day because i saw it during the day while it was day light and how i could look for a cloud with sun on it at 10:30pm?

this was a most unusual experience and the fourth experience at witnessing something in the sky out of the ordinary and only 200 or 250 feet above me hanging at a low rate of speed hiding in a cloud and with so many other unusual characteristics attributed to it?
content.summary: Black triangle reporting on way to work! 6-28-8

content.detailedDescription: We were on the street coming back from the park,we live in brooklyn, at first i thought it was an airplane from the us air force because it was dark with lights and looks like it was doing piruets,then it change first it take form like triangle then to a hexagone but like it was passing  it looks like 7 or 9 dark balls with the changing lights, when they were far away one of then separated and turn silver,i couldn't see more because my baby was crying (i am a babysitter)it was traveling southwest to northeast. i just reporting this because i want to know if someone else saw it.
content.summary: It was diferents shapes silver/black with lights red ,yellow and green

content.detailedDescription:
This happened june 24, 2008 between 10:15 and 10:30 pm in steuben county, indiana.

my sister and i were headed home from our mom's house, going north on cr 225 w near pleasant lake, indiana. about halfway up in the northern sky, right ahead of us, i noticed a bright amber-colored oval-shaped light. at first i thought it was a bright star or planet, but as we drove, it got bigger and we got closer to it. i knew then it was not a star or planet. as we approached the corner of 225 w and 500s, near the boy scout camp, the light turned red suddenly. then just as suddenly it went out like someone turning out a light bulb. it never re-appeared. it didn't go behind a cloud. it just went out and disappeared. i've looked for it every night since and had no luck.

it was the very definition of a ufo - an unidentified flying object. i felt eerie, and knew i had seen something totally out of the ordinary. you want to see one your whole life, then when you do, it's scary!

another thing is this - i too have heard the jet noises and loud booms that have plagued other hoosiers this spring and summer. one of the booms woke me out of a sound sleep a few weeks ago. i've heard the jet noise while out with my dogs at night - it's like ten jets flying low all at once, then complete silence and nothing to be seen. not sure if all of this is related or not.
content.summary: This happened june 24, 2008 in steuben county, indiana...

content.detailedDescription:
I was only 4 years old and living on my grandfathers farm in zaandam, north holland in the netherlands.  it was around 9 pm - late for me - and it was a rare sultry october evening in north holland.  my parents were gone that night and opa slipped into his klompjes and we meandered outside wondering why it was so humid & warm and why the little lake and the tiny canals around our farm were not frozen solid - like yesterday?  deftly he swung me over on his strong shoulders - both my legs dangling - when he pointed to the sky and we saw a cigar-shaped hull with 6-8  colored lights, in a row, on both ends.  grandma was called and said it was not a blimp in that it was too skinny and had nothing dangling beneath it.  so said grandma.  the year was 1952 - and opa and oma thought hitler was back.  

from the middle there were several bright lights shining down on a few of our holstein cows but the beam of each light did not go all the way down to the grass.  it hovered.  i remember thinking it was strange in that it was still dark under and around the cows.  only the back of the cows were lit up brightly.  we watched this giant move slowly across our farm and then to the next farm.  suddenly it sped straight up, going neither left nor right, until it became a dot - smaller and smaller.  the whole sighting (in my 4 year old mind and as it was told to my grandmother) lasted only 30 minutes or so.  i was preparing my stallion to go to school the next day when i noticed that the lake & canals were frozen again. 

my grandfather died @ 84 a few months later even though he was in perfect health.  i always wondered whether this new ufo paradigm could not occupy the same mind as the old paradigm he was so used to - and he succumbed to the discord.  my grandmother died 5 month later from a broken heart.  my parents sold the farm and we moved into the big city amsterdam.  i started montessori school the same year.  too many funerals for me.

i became enlightened instead.  suddenly i was able to learn at a much faster rate than before the ufo experience and i excelled in everything i wanted to do.  within just a few years i spoke 5 languages and i was considered a child prodigy.  no one knew why.  i did.  i got my ph.D. at the early age of 19 and never stopped studying.  i became a drugless doctor and holistically healed thousands - without resorting to surgery.

i'm about ready for retirement now - but i'll never forgot that time we saw that big spaceship hanging in the sky while i tightly hugged my grandfathers trembling bald head.  

sin cere
dr. avb - ph.D. md
content.summary: Light didn't hit the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Radomly taking pictures of valley early in the morning. the dogs were barking and i thought a deer might be out there. i had my camera on burst and was holding the shutter button down. i took two pictures one after the other. the first one had this black thing in it. the second it's gone. i don't know what it is. i only saw it that night when i downloaded it on the computer.
as i was looking at all the photos i had taken that day i found something else on the mountain top. the second picture shows the black something on the mountain. the last one is it moving away and a better shape to it.  they move so fast that it would be hard to see them with the naked eye.
content.summary: Black oval with two tails with white on the beginning or a light

content.detailedDescription:
On june 30, 2008 at approximately 9:40 pm, i was getting into my car with my 10 yr. old grand daughter and her friend in lowell, ma, when i just happened to look up at the sky and saw 2 really large glowing objects in the eastern sky - they were a good distance away, but they were so large i could clearly see them.  at first i thought they must be airplanes but the more i looked i realized that there was no way they were airplanes.  i yelled at the girls to look at the sky and all 3 of us just stared at - from what i could see - 2 trapezoid shaped objects with very bright orange/yellow glowing lights on each side of them and also one orange light on the top.  they clearly were not airplanes, as they did not move like airplanes and they were so close side by side in the sky (one was slightly more elevated than than the other).  they were moving through the sky and we watched for 3-4 minutes and then they just disappeared.  my grand daughter was very excited and thought we had definitely just seen 2 ufo's (as did i).  her 10 yr. old friend however, was very scared and almost having a panic attack.  i tried to calm her down and tell her it was just some sort of advertising thing and not to worry.  i quickly dropped off the girls at their house next street over and went in search of the objects.  they had appeared in the eastern sky so i headed east to see if i could spot them again - or to see if there was anything in the sky (advertisement blimps or something) that could have explained it, but there was absolutely nothing (plus it was about 9:45 pm, so most businesses were closed then) i checked the local movie theater and they had no lights advertising anything etc.  

   one more thing, when i was staring at the objects i tried putting my glasses on to see if i could see them more clearly (even though i'm far sighted) it did magnify it somewhat and the lights looked like flames shooting out of the sides.  the whole thing was very exciting to witness.

if you have any idea of what it is i saw, i would love to hear from you.
content.summary: Saw 2 trapezoid shaped objects with bright orange lights side by side (one little higher) 2 lights on both sides one light on top hovered 5 min. then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend both worked the same shifts at chatercom in louisville ky and we would commute together to and from work. after work (around 12:00am) we would often visit a construction site (subdivision in progress just some black-topped coldisacks but no houses) off of the taylorsville lake damn road. we went here to be alone together for a while before we went home (lived with her mom so this was our alone time ;) around 1 am we both noticed what looked like car headlights in the sky ahead of us. we soon noticed 3 pair of the lights flying in a strait line. they seemed really low 80 meters (just a little above the tree tops) and the lights were way more intense than anything i've ever seen on any aircraft. this would not be that unusual if there was some sort of sound but there was "no sound at all" and the lights would hover in one spot for minutes before moving. they all came from the same direction in total there was about 15 of them came in packs of 3 to 5 . they all seemed to come from the direction of the lake and end up going toward louisville. they would all travel strait until they reached one point just about directly above us where they would separate travel in different directions then they would meet back up to begin traveling in a strait line again toward louisville. 
the best way to describe it was a silent helicopter with two very large super bright spot lights mounted on the bottom. i could not see the shape of the craft because the lights were so bright. i must say the weirdness came from the craft feeling like it was 80 meters above me hovering and there was no sound at all all you can here is crickets and the occasional car in the distance. the crafts seemed to move a constant slow paced speed other than when they were completely hovering still. you can hear everything thing in this area because everything echos anyone that lives in this area will tell you the same (you can hear a car coming 10 minutes before it gets close to you.) but i could not hear the slightest sound from this craft. 
my dad which lives in the backwoods (grays run road) about 5 minutes from this sighting said he has seen these crafts on more than one occasion hovering above the trees.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights, completely silent, 80 meters above ground, travels slow or it can hover in one spot.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend both worked the same shifts at chatercom in louisville ky and we would commute together to and from work. after work (around 12:00am) we would often visit a construction site (subdivision in progress - just some black-topped coldisacks with no houses) off of the taylorsville lake damn road. we went here to be alone together for a while before we went home (lived with her mom so this was our alone time ;) around 1 am we both noticed what looked like car headlights in the sky ahead of us. we soon noticed 3 pair of the lights flying in a strait line. they seemed really low 80 meters (just a little above the tree tops) and the lights were way more intense than anything i've ever seen on any aircraft. this would not be that unusual if there was some sort of sound but there was "no sound at all" and the lights would hover in one spot for minutes before moving. they all came from the same direction in total there was about 15 of them came in packs of 3 to 5 . they all seemed to come from the direction of the lake and end up going toward louisville. they would all travel strait until they reached one point just about directly above us where they would separate travel in different directions then they would meet back up to begin traveling in a strait line again toward louisville. 
the best way to describe it was a silent helicopter with two very large super bright spot lights mounted on the bottom. i could not see the shape of the craft because the lights were so bright. i must say the weirdness came from the craft feeling like it was 80 meters above me hovering and there was no sound at all all you can here is crickets and the occasional car in the distance. the crafts seemed to move a constant slow paced speed other than when they were completely hovering still. you can hear everything in this area because everything echos, anyone that lives in this area will tell you the same (you can hear a car coming 10 minutes before it gets close to you.) but i could not hear the slightest sound from this craft directly above me. 
my dad which lives in the backwoods (grays run road) about 5 minutes from this sighting said he has seen these crafts on more than one occasion hovering above the trees close to his house. there has to be numerous people other than my girlfriend, my dad, and i that have seen these crafts because they flew around the whole area for an extended period of time. 
i do not believe these are of et origin but there is something strange going on and i hope someone can offer answers or a similar experience.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights. really low. no sound at all. hover for long period of time.

content.detailedDescription: 4: 40 am july 1 2008...I got home from work and parked my car at in front of my apartment. every night i look into the sky always looking for something, for proof. i noticed more stars than usual and they were flashing / twinkling more than usual. after gazing for about 2 minutes i noticed several of them moving slowly to the west and then disappearing. there were two more patches east of the location, one patch had three lights. i noticed this one because a light turned on "like a light bulb" and started moving west, and the two other faint lights followed and disappeared into the blackness. the second  patch i mentioned was only two lights that repeated the previous steps moving slowly to the west. after trying to understand what i  just saw a meteor like object soared from west to east. i thought it was amazing. what i seen that night has no other explanation. i look up every night when i get home for  a few minutes to see something real, and i finally have! i will definitely look a little more often and spend a little more time gazing among the stars from now on. sorry i don't have any photos, this is the first time something has ever caught my eye while looking for ufo's. i didn't want to miss any of it.
content.summary: Flashy star like objects moving

content.detailedDescription: 4: 40 am july 1 2008...I got home from work and parked my car at in front of my apartment. every night i look into the sky always looking for something, for proof. i noticed more stars than usual and they were flashing / twinkling more than usual. after gazing for about 2 minutes i noticed several of them moving slowly to the west and then disappearing. there were two more patches east of the location, one patch had three lights. i noticed this one because a light turned on "like a light bulb" and started moving west, and the two other faint lights followed and disappeared into the blackness. the second  patch i mentioned was only two lights that repeated the previous steps moving slowly to the west. after trying to understand what i  just saw a meteor like object soared from west to east. i thought it was amazing. what i seen that night has no other explanation. i look up every night when i get home for  a few minutes to see something real, and i finally have! i will definitely look a little more often and spend a little more time gazing among the stars from now on. sorry i don't have any photos, this is the first time something has ever caught my eye while looking for ufo's. i didn't want to miss any of it.
content.summary: Multiple flashy moving objects

content.detailedDescription:
I work the 3rd shift (3am - noon est) at my firm. i was outside of my office building taking a smoke break around 5am. it's a clear night this morning and the stars and moon are quite visible. i was just smoking and my mind was just going over mundane things and then i don't know why, i just craned my head as far back as it could go and i saw a decent size ball/sphere/orb (not sure what to call it) of light flying pretty much right over me.

for a split second i thought it was just a light on a plane but then i reaized the light wasn't attached to anything. it was just a ball of light moving through the sky. i couldn't tell you the altitude except it wasn't very high in the sky. this is raleigh, nc and all the buildings are kind of small and this thing wasn't very high in the sky above my office building. it's hard to describe the size but i would say that it looked like the size of a quarter held at arms distance, maybe a little larger. it was a solid white color and although that sounds plain, there was more to the color of the thing.Wow, it's so hard to explain. it was just an intense, rich white light. the other thing that surprised me is that it made no sound. i mean it was completely silent. it was around 5 am, there was no one around, no traffic either. the night was so quiet except for the sounds of night (slight chirping, crickets, etc), and this thing was flying low in the sky, i could not believe i wasn't hearing any noise coming from it at all. it was truly bizarre. the other thing i noticed was it's speed. it was travelling fairly slow, kind of cruising for lack of a better work/description. it struck me as if the thing wasn't flying so much as "gliding." it for the most part was traveling in the same direction but kind of wobled to the left and to the right a little bit. it seemed like it was in complete control to say the least.Again, it's so hard to explain what i saw, i've never seen anything like that before. finally the thing kind of picked up it's speed and zoomed off. more like swoshed off. it seemed to me that the thing covered a big distance in a short amount of time and then it was completely gone. the whole thing probably took 2-3 minutes but it felt longer than that for me.

i have to say that the thing left me in awe. it was also kind of eerie initially. i remember looking around frantically to see if anyone was around so i could share the experience with and so it could be more real to me. i know that no one is going to believe i saw what i saw. although it was kind of eerie, it was very beautiful to me. i don't know how else to put it. in the end there's no way of knowing what i saw. i just know it wasn't a plane/helicopter/baloon/blimp/star/planet or shooting star. again, i don't know what it was, i just know what it wasn't. it was a beautiful experience and i count myself fortunate enough to have been at the right place and right time.

i'm sure you get a lot more exciting reports than this one but i believe that if you experience something like this, it's our responsibility to report it. there is no doubt i experienced something amazing this morning and what that means just blows my mind. again, i wish there was someone around to share it with. if you happen to have any other reports in raleigh for today would it be possible to contact me? it would very much like to compare notes with anyone who might have seen it. it was so amazing i find it hard to believe i was the only one.

i apologize for writing so incoherently, my mind is still in shock over this and i felt it would be better to get everything out as fast as possible so i wouln't forget any details.

again, thank you.
sv in raleigh nc.
content.summary: Sphere/orb over raleigh

content.detailedDescription:
Location: in a truck, headed south to mexico for vacation, approximately 8 miles north of lukeville, az on state hwy 85 looking toward the east.  in the east are the diablo mountains and ajo range (mountains).

who:  besides myself, an aunt, an uncle, a cousin and a family friend all witnessed the event.  my aunt and unlce were in the front (my aunt was driving).  i sat behind the driver's seat (behind my aunt), our family friend sat in the rear passenger (behind my uncle) and my cousin sat between us.

when:  approximately 7pm, dusk, the sun had not completely set behind the mountains on the west side of the road.

what:  as they occured...My uncle exclaimed, "check it out!" he was pointing toward the diablo/ajo mountains on the driver's side of the truck as we headed south.  we all looked and immediately saw a large circular light in the sky (like the sun, or full moon would appear) above the mountains.  the light appeared two dimensional.  we rolled down the windows for a good look.

the range was approximately 5-6 miles away and the height of the mountains in this area is about 2500-3000 feet. the light was about a 1/2 a finger's height above the mountain with my index finger about 5 inches from my face using the width of my finger as the height.  the light was also the about the same measurement in diameter as distance above the mountains.  just guessing we believed about 150-200 feet across.  their was no visible aircraft or other device that the light was eminating from.  however, there was a jet cruising in the distance and the lights we saw were about 50 times larger than the jet visible in the sky.  i believe jets crusie at about 30,000 feet and this light was only about 3,000 feet in the air and was at least as big as a jet on its own.

it was strange enough to see this big light.  but, it suddenly vanished almost as soon as we noticed it.  then another appeared a little higher and to the north, then off, then on and directly above.  it repeated a couple of more times making a circular pattern if one were to draw a line between the circles of light.  (remember only one light at a time was on and they were stationary.)  next, another light appeared seemingly further away from the mountain, in a nw direction from where we had just seen the other lights, then off.  then on again in a second, continuing on its nw path, then off, then appeared again about back where it started, then off.  then, two more times moving in its nw direction, then off.  after it disappeared this last time we did not see it again.

unfortunately, since the event was only seconds long, by the time we got a camera out nobody had a chance to take a picture.  we gazed into the mountains for several more minutes and never saw any aircraft or other objects that may have been reflecting light.  this was my first ufo encounter and although i am not convinced it was e.T., i do classify this as an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Lights in the sky, arizona

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired naval flight officer and retired police officer, 65 years old.
i was a lieutenant and the navigator-communicator on a navy patrol plane back in the 70's. we were on a mission headed s. out of iceland and were located a couple of hundred miles w. of uk. we were flying at 300 ft. altitude and about 280 knots. the first thing i noticed was a metal sphere floating on the water. round as a beach ball and about 20 ft. in diameter. i just happened to spot it while looking out the window. we were still a long way from our assigned search area. i called it on ics and dropped an on top (electronic position marker). we were emcon (unable to turn on radar, radio or any electronic emissions for security purposes}. flight circled back and we looked for it a couple of passes but it was getting dark and we had an assigned search to do so took up our original southerly heading. this sphere may have had nothing to do with the ufo sighting that followed. i observed no connection between the two but mentioned it because they happened so close together. it could have been some odd buoy adrift.
a few minutes later someone called on the ics that there was a bright light on our starboard side. i looked out and sure enough there was a bright (glaring) day-glo green light i would guess 1/2 mile off our starboard wing. the light was so bright i could not see the craft that it was on, just the light. looked like nothing i ever saw before. it was at our altitude and keeping pace with us exactly. could not make a radar sweep without letting the russkies know we were coming but i sure wanted to. the whole crew watched it. i watched it as much as i could but had my navigation and logs to keep up. every time i looked out it was just out there, bright, greenish and staying in one place relative to the airplane.
i guess about 20 to 25 minutes later i heard the pilots in the flight station on ics say "there it goes, there it goes" then state that it was speeding off in front of the aircraft. i stood up and went forward (2 steps) to the flight station but it was already over the horizon. i remember they were amazed at it's acceleration & speed. i had logged the sightings on the official flight logs and turned it in at debrief. i remember some of the officers on the crew did not want me to but i had seen it, logged it and was not going to alter logs to look less controversial. i figured i would let the wing debriefing officer figure it out or hide it if he wanted to. i was never ask about it again by the navy and no official mention of it was ever made of it to my knowledge after i turned in my logs. there were ten or twelve witnesses aboard but it would be hard to locate them. i was nav-com on one crew and tacco (tactical officer) on another and i don't remember which crew was which. i could look in my old cruise book and find out but those guys are scattered all over the world now. all of them were my friends.
content.summary: Bright day-glo green light flew alongside our aircraft over the mid-atlantic ocean.
